title: Volusion Site Redesign
snippet:
Project Job Description

The Primary goal of the project is to:

Redesign website to new look with modern design like - https://officefurnitureoutlet-
com.myshopify.com/

Client need a clean design for an office furniture store .

Current site - http://www.sdofficefurniture.com/Default.asp

Copy all design elements from the site - https://officefurnitureoutlet-com.myshopify.com/

We will provide below Elements in the volusion site:

- Home page as like site - https://officefurnitureoutlet-com.myshopify.com/

- Mega menu dropdowns for navigation as like = ALL OFFICE FURNITURE

- Nice slider which will display promotions or featured products/categories

- Display categories on home page

- Display featured products on home page

- Design and develop category page like - https://officefurnitureoutlet-
com.myshopify.com/collections

- Design and develop product details page with bigger images for products

- Design content page as per new design

- Design shopping cart pages as per new design

- Design checkout pages as per new design

More Requirements from client:

Sales toolbar top of header. Need to be able to easily add/change text, links,

background color and button. See https://officefurnitureoutlet-
com.myshopify.com/

 Width 1180.

 Content boxed but specials toolbar and footer can be 100%

 White background

 Image slider on homepage

 Mega menu (please show me styles and options)

 Increase product image size.

See https://www.evutec.com/index.php/product/karbon-kozane-s-for-iphone-se-

5-5s.html

 Email optin lightbox (show me design options)

Sidebar on category pages

On category menu, need sub menus to

show. https://www.evutec.com/index.php/product/iphone.html?SID=iphi9lta9rlq

66o3hdri6rlfb0

Need sticky menu

Design must be responsive.

Need feature product carousel on homepage

Need icons on category product image to highlight (new, featured or sale)

Under all office furniture, need category pages like this. https://officefurnitureoutlet-
com.myshopify.com/collections

Need icon on category to show if product has multiple color options.

Non- Functional Requirement
